text.content:
Add 14 New Playable Ancestries for your 5E or Pathfinder Game!

The Kickstarter Ends Soon! Check It Out Today Before It Ends!

If you like angels, devils, werecreatures, and other legendary creatures as much as we do, check out Living Legends from our friends at Roll For Combat!

With Living Legends, you can become the legend with 14 jam-packed ancestries including mechanics, feats, lore, and everything you need to build a rich character!

This book is absolutely packed with content for players, GMs, and people who just love reading about legendary species.

Inside Living Legends You’ll Find:

  • 14 Playable Ancestries and Species: Play all sorts of creatures from myths, legends, and fantasy folklore, including ocular evil eyes, nautiloid cerebrophages, stony gargoyles, riddling sphinxes, towering giants, treelike arboreals, ferocious werecreatures, leonine and ophidian lamias, multifaceted swarmblood, scheming devils, multipart fusions, and celestial angels, as well as golemborn, constructs come to life, and psychopomps, the emissaries of death.

  • Deep Lore: These ancestries aren’t monoliths! Learn about their society and culture, including multiple factions and societal groups for each ancestry

  • Hundreds of Feats: Customize your character in style and shape your character’s legend with plenty of feats for each ancestry.

  • Digital Assets and Pathbuilder 2e File: All purchases receive a full set of art and tokens to be used in any VTT or your other favorite online game, and Pathfinder 2e purchases receive a JSON file for Pathbuilder 2e to help build your character.

  • Foundry VTT, Animated Tokens, Plastic Pawns, Plushies, and More: Become a legend in style with a premium Foundry VTT module for Pathfinder 2e and 5E, over a hundred physical plastic tokens, hundreds of animated digital tokens that work on nearly any VTT, psychopomp plushies, and much more!

  • This and more can be unlocked with stretch goals!

Back Battlezoo Ancestries: Living Legends Today!
